A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The movie is a pass\, but nothing more than that.
During this whole year I have not seen a single Disney production movie\, I hold them accountable for a mediocre film industry
Spending more money doesn't mean it is a good movie
I get it Thor and Spidey man where good movies but still 
They where not enough to draw me into the theater. 
I had waited to break my hiatus for Star Wars the last jedi
But it became another Meh! Movie from Disney.
So many plot wholes\, all of the villians where outsmarted 
over and over again\, It is hard to belive the almughty First
Order is lead by morons specially Snoke in his speah saying that he can read Kylo's mind and still not knowing that he was going to get cut in half by him\, it is just unbelievable . Then Finn's arc was so unnecessary and his love relationship was so forced and awkward. Literally the only character with future growth is Poe Dameron when Leia taght him a great lesson about 
leadership and being a hero. And so forth I have a plethora of 
issues with the movie\, not personal but from the structure of the 
film.
Pd. The Red Royal guards felt more of a threat that any
other villian in the movie\, props for the Red Guards
